plot outline: Narasimhe Gowde (Vishnuvardhan), head of 48 villages has high regards for his sincerity and wisdom in his judgements. After his untimely death, his elder son Gowda (Vishnuvardhan) takes his throne and passes a wrong judgement against his brother Chikka (Vishnuvardhan). What circumstances lead to this is the rest of the story.
title: Simhadriya Simha
plot: Narasimhe Gowde (Vishnuvardhan), head of 48 villages has high regards for his sincerity and wisdom in his judgements.
